0.text: Bug 10571  WizardPage shows plug-ins not found when plug-ins exist.

1.text: 1)File->import...->External Plug-ins and Fragments 2)Next 3)Select 'import plug-ins from the file system' and choose some location ex.

2.text: C:\Temp 4)Next : the wizard page appears showing no plug-ins found 5)Back  6)Select 'choose from plug-ins in the runtime platform' 7)Next  The wizard page will appear showing no plug-ins found.

4.text: If I  choose 'choose from plug-ins in the runtime platform' right off the bat plug- ins will be found.
